project.name: nuxeo-database-templates
project.description: Deploys per-database templates used by Nuxeo. Among other things, these templates designate the fields in database tables to be defined as CLOB types, capable of holding large amounts of text.

target.name: deploy
target.description: deploys a database template directory to Nuxeo

target.name: deploy-templates-dir
target.description: deploys a CollectionSpace-specific Nuxeo database template folder for the ${db} database to ${nuxeo.templates.dir}

target.name: update-nuxeo-config
target.description: updates the main Nuxeo configuration file to specify the database template folder to use for CollectionSpace

target.name: undeploy
target.description: undeploys CollectionSpace-specific Nuxeo database template folders from ${nuxeo.templates.dir}

target.name: undeploy-template-dirs
target.description: deletes CollectionSpace-specific database template folders from the deploy directory

target.name: reset-nuxeo-config
target.description: updates the main Nuxeo configuration file to reset the database template folder to an empty value

target.name: backup-nuxeo-config
target.description: makes a single backup copy of the existing main Nuxeo configuration file, overwriting the previous backup

target.name: check-templates-dir-exists
target.description: checks for the existence of a Nuxeo database template folder for the ${db} database

fail.message: Nuxeo database templates directory ${collectionspace.template.dir.path} could not be found.

target.name: check-propertyfile-task-exists
target.description: checks that the PropertyFile task exists; that task is required by one or more targets in this build file
